title: I. THE GRANDMOTHER OF THE DOLLS.

book.title: Little Mr. Thimblefinger and His Queer Country
book.description: 简介： Once upon a time there lived on a plantation, in the very middle of Middle Georgia, a little girl and a little boy and their negro nurse. The little girls name was Sweetest Susan. That was the name her mother gave her when she was a baby, and she was...
